name: "World War II: TCG" Digital Trading Card Game
blurb: From former Blizzard Entertainment workers: "World War II: TCG" a Multiplatform Digital Card Game inspired by the WW2 historic events.

rewards.reward: No Reward

PRIVATE TIER:
=============================
Closed Beta Invite, and Your Name in the credits as Kickstarter Official Backer.
=============================

SARGEANT TIER:
=============================
2x General Packs ($20.00 value). 
10x Enlisted Packs ($20.00 value).
1x Kickstarter Unique Card (Common Rarity).
=============================
Also Includes: 
Closed Beta Invite.
Your Name in the credits as Kickstarter Official Backer.

WARRANT OFFICER TIER:
=============================
5x General Packs ($50.00 value). 
15x Enlisted Packs ($30.00 value). 
2x Kickstarter Unique Card (Uncommon Rarity, Common Rarity).
1x Player Portrait.
Access to the Alpha (Est. End of August).
5x Friend Closed Beta Invites.
=============================
Also Includes:
Your Name in the credits as Kickstarter Official Backer.
